name: Apple Baked Squash
keywords: acorn squash, apple, apple cider, fall, side dish
recipeIngredient: 2 acorn squash, halved crosswise, seeds and fibers scooped out
2 small McIntosh apples, halved, cored and cut into 1/4-inch-thick slices

recipeInstructions.text: Slice off the bottom of each squash half so that they stand flat, being careful not to cut into the flesh. Place in a medium-size roasting pan. Fan half of an apple in the cavity of each squash half. Add 1 teaspoon of butter and 1/4 cup of the cider to each. Pour the remaining 2 cups of cider into the roasting pan. Cover the squash loosely with aluminum foil. Roast until the squash is tender, about 1 1/2 hours. Place 1 squash half on each of 4 plates and serve immediately.
